mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC, id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (user_id, receiver_name, phone, province, city, district, detail_address, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{receiverName}, #{phone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{detailAddress}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET receiver_name=#{receiverName}, phone=#{phone}, province=#{province}, city=#{city}, district=#{district}, detail_address=#{detailAddress} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE address SET is_default = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE address SET is_default = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
